derivation: from G1100 (γλωσσόκομον) and the base of G2889 (γλωσσόκομον);
strongs_def: properly, a case (to keep mouthpieces of wind-instruments in) i.e. (by extension) a casket or (specially) purse
outline:
1. a case in which to keep mouth-pieces of wind instruments
  2. a small box for other uses
    1. esp. a casket, a purse to keep money in
